trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> e de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> é usada para formatar e unformat valores exibidos por um controle de formulários do Windows que está associado aos dados por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event occurs whenever the bound value changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento ocorre sempre que uma propriedade do controle está associada a um valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento ocorre sempre que altera o valor associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> eventos permitem que você criar formatos personalizados para exibir dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data in a table is of type <xref:System.Decimal>, you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> to the formatted value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados em uma tabela são do tipo <xref:System.Decimal>, você pode especificar que os dados devem ser exibidos no formato de moeda local – definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> para o valor formatado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento.

trans-unit.source: You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: Você deve unformat Consequentemente o valor exibido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegado para ambos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> eventos e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> propriedade a ser adicionada a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method to format the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency.
trans-unit.target: O `DecimalToCurrencyString` delegado de evento, que é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento, usa o <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> método para formatar o valor associado (um <xref:System.Decimal> tipo) como moeda.

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: O `CurrencyStringToDecimal` delegado de evento, que é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento, converte o valor exibido pelo controle de volta para o <xref:System.Decimal> tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the value of the current property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém o valor da propriedade atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the value.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de dados do valor desejado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do valor desejado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> propriedade permite que você verifique o tipo da propriedade que o valor está sendo convertido em.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property to determine whether the conversion of one type to another can proceed.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> propriedade para determinar se a conversão de um tipo para outro pode continuar.

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` method tests whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> is a string.
trans-unit.target: O `DecimalToCurrencyString` método testes se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> é uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: If not, the code exits the method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o código será encerrado para o método.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the `CurrencyStringToDecimal` method tests whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> is a <xref:System.Decimal>, and exits if it is not `true`.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o `CurrencyStringToDecimal` método testes se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> é um <xref:System.Decimal>e será encerrado se não for `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The value contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property depends on the event in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned.
trans-unit.target: O valor contido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade depende do evento no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> can be returned in either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> podem ser retornados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property contains the unformatted property value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> é retornado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade contém o valor da propriedade não formatado da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento, você pode ler o valor da propriedade, formatar o valor e redefinir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade para o novo valor (formatado), portanto, definir o valor exibido no controle associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> é retornado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento, a propriedade contém o valor de formatação personalizada do controle associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> eventos, você deve ler o valor formatado, analisá-lo e convertê-lo de volta para o mesmo tipo de dados como a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can then reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode redefinir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> propriedade para o não formatado valor e, portanto, defina o valor da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the data source, examine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo da fonte de dados, examine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegado para ambos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> eventos e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> propriedade a ser adicionada a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, uses the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method to format the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency.
trans-unit.target: O `DecimalToCurrencyString` delegado de evento, que é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento, usa o <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> método para formatar o valor associado (um <xref:System.Decimal> tipo) como moeda.

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: O `CurrencyStringToDecimal` delegado de evento, que é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento, converte o valor exibido pelo controle de volta para o <xref:System.Decimal> tipo.
